widget.header: Let’s Find Out What’s Been Achieved So Far by Our Teams at Justia

config.title: Justia Properties Mass Update:
config.description: We keep standardizing and promoting our products throughout all Justia web properties. We updated the header and footer on all of our public sites. We also published a campaign to boost JLD profile claims.

config.title: Marketing Blasts:
config.description: We continue marketing Justia Amplify to all of our existing website and blog clients via email, as well as our JLD claimed lawyers. We are running this effort in addition to our regular monthly scheduled campaigns.

config.title: Automated QA:
config.description: As accustomed, our QA Automation Team continues delivering automated verifications to our properties. This month's releases include the first version for Hazel (Elevate), Bar Data imports integrity, Dockets verifications, and general fixes.

config.title: IT Maintenance:
config.description: We upgraded the hosting infrastructure of some of our Oyez projects such as Body Politic, Shifting Scales, and pocketjustice.com to keep them current and secure.

config.title: U.S. State Regulations:
config.description: This month, we finally released the latest quarterly update of all U.S. state regulations.

config.title: Social Media Icons Update:
config.description: We updated the selection of social media icons on our websites and blogs with new versions following brand colors and guidelines from major social networks. We also added a few new options to use in Elevate sites.
